channel.title: Salvia
channel.description:

and can anyone offer any tips?
it sounds like a cool drug and i was hoping to try it out with a friend.

item.title: Salvia
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:14, topic:162277”]It’s important to be prepared for a salvia trip. Put on some really relaxing music, not trippy music, just relaxing. Read up on meditation and salvia as a spiritual tool. Sit on a bed while you trip and have a good friend or a lover sit next to you. Think of a spiritual question you need answered. Take a deep toke and holy fucking shit nothing exists

just

time[/quote]
yeah, i already knew about some of that, like the meditation and the question, but thanks for the advice about the music, though im stuck between 2 questions, and i need to think that over

Read full topic

Sit on a bed while you trip and have a good friend or a lover sit next to you. Think of a spiritual question you need answered. Take a deep toke and holy fucking shit nothing exists

just

time

item.title: Salvia
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

It is illegal in Missouri and Louisiana, as well as Australia. Everywhere else it is an uncontrolled substance, meaning there are no laws about age, etc.

However, majority of head shops will not sell to minors. You can give them a go, or of course lie about your age when buying on the internet.

www.shamanhut.com is very good. Cheap prices, accepts paypal(unlike majority of online drug shops), good quality, and great customer service.

Keep in mind that salvia does not work for about 5% of the population. Also, it may take a few times until it works. It took me about 3 times until I “broke through” although I did get somewhat strong buzz each time. For best results, use a butane mini-torch lighter. Salvia needs to be burned at a high temperature, a regular lighter seems to struggle a bit. A pipe or bong can be used, I much prefer a bong for it. Hold it in for as long as you can, try to aim for 30 seconds. You only need a hit or two. Especially if you get a 20x extract or higher. When filling the bowl though, I would pack about 1/4 - 1/2 a bowl or so, a sprinkle seems to burn too fast.

10x is good for beginners, 20x if you feel you are mentally prepared for whatever it may throw at you. My favorite is 40x.

Ah, also if you are doing it alone, be careful. Salvia is very very powerful, and I strongly recommend you have a trip sitter otherwise you might hurt yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Salvia
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

Whatever you can get cheapest as a ratio (one gram of 10x equals a half of a gram of 20x, and so on) is what you should buy. jme_009 probably knows more about buying salvia than I do.

@Silver_Lining wrote:
